Pre-Game Insights: Houston visits Memphis trying to prolong its four-game road winning streak.
The Grizzlies are 7-1 against the rest of the division.
The Rockets are 3-3 in one-possession games.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Grizzlies average 35.8 defensive rebounds per game led by Santi Aldama averaging 5.7.
The Rockets average 112.9 points per game, 1.8 fewer than the 114.7 the Grizzlies allow to opponents.
Jaren Jackson Jr. is averaging 22.7 points, 6.4 rebounds, 1.5 steals and 1.6 blocks for the Grizzlies.
Fred VanVleet is averaging 14.9 points, six assists and 1.6 steals for the Rockets.
Others: Desmond Bane: day to day (ankle), Marcus Smart: out (finger), Santi Aldama: out (ankle), Vince Williams Jr.: out (ankle), Ja Morant: out (ac joint), GG Jackson II: out (foot ).
Tari Eason: day to day (injury management), Jabari Smith Jr.: out (hand)
